climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Travel Laundry Sheets - Lightweight Packaging Box, Easy to carry and can be easily stuffed into a travel box or handbag; Save space and facilitate travel;The size of the box is 4.72 x3.03 x1.06 inch
Natural Ingredients - Low foam, easy to rinse, gentle to skin, suitable for both the elderly, children and pets. Enjoy the ultimate paper-thin concept of laundry detergent sheets

Ultra Concentrated - With strong decontamination power, penetrating deep into the fiber layer of clothing, thoroughly cleaning food residues, dust, liquor juices and other pollutants, completely vanish the dirt
From Ordinary Cotton to Synthetics, Linens, and Blends - Enyur laundry sheets naturally take specks of dirt allowing the fabric to retain its best texture

Sealed Well, No affected by Moisture and Causing Adhesion - Every time the laundry detergent is removed from the packaging box, it can be easily covered tightly, without contact with air or liquid components, and will not overflow

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Completely soluble, Laundry Sheets dissolve completely in hot or cold water. And just like that, in hot or cold water, our sheets work with all machines .

It integrates the functions of clothing softener and disinfecting water, and has strong cleaning ability. For stains, we suggest that when dealing with difficult stains, please dissolve laundry sheets and soak them for at least 15 minutes before cleaning, which will have stronger cleaning ability Perfect Laundry Routine - Enjoy the ultimate paper-thin, gentle-to-skin of laundry detergent sheets Clean Fabric, Luxurious Results - From ordinary cotton to synthetics, linens, and blends, laundry sheets take specks of dirt in paraben-free composition allowing the fabric to retain its best texture.
Advanced Design With its space-saving design, you will be able to deposit them anywhere and take them with you wherever you're traveling.

Travel Companion Little package design Convenient portable little package design , laundry on the go essential for your travel, camping trip, dorm life, RV road trip, laundromat, college laundry life. Small package, great help for your laundry routine. Cleaning clothes Don't worry about your travel，Enyur laundry detergent sheets let you have a good memories and clean clothes during your trip. Travel essentials Take it with you when traveling, so that your friends can also feel the convenience of traveling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Laundry Detergent Sheets by Enyur
reviews.reviewText: These detergent sheets have become an all time favorite for me. The fact that they are scent-free is a huge plus, especially because two of my granddaughters have sensitive skin.The convenience of these sheets cannot be overstated. They take up very little space in my luggage, and I don't have to worry about any liquid spills.Each sheet dissolves easily in water and effectively cleans my clothes. I found that three sheet was sufficient for a big load of laundry, so the 32 loads in one pack lasted me quite a while.Not only are these sheets great for traveling, but I also use them at home. They work just as well as traditional liquid or powder detergents, and I appreciate the eco-friendly packaging.Overall, convenient, effective, and scent-free, making them a versatile choice for anyone on the go or looking for a more compact laundry solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Took this to Europe for washing clothes. I used them both to wash up a few things in a sink but also at our airbnb in the washer. It took up no weight, was so useful, no scent to worry about, clothes were clean.Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent laundry sheets
reviews.reviewText: I liked the cleaning effectiveness and ease of use in our stateroom and lodge sinks. Much easier to pack than liquid or powder detergent and lighter weight too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ease of use, great for travel. Appreciate the environmental friendly idea. I did have to re wash a microfiber cleaning rag in my regular liquid detergent to get it completely clean but this product is good for lightly soiled items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought these for a recent two week trip to Europe, not wanting to pay resort or cruise ship fees for clean undies. (My idea of just taking old stuff, and throwing away dirty clothes was vetoed). Worked well! They dissolve quickly, and worked great on dress shirts, pants and undies. No gross perfume smell either.Pack easily, don’t take up much space. Thin sheets, worked well in warm water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and cost-effective solution when traveling
reviews.reviewText: My family and I travel out of town several times a year, so it’s always a challenge to purchase laundry detergent, which tends to be bulky, difficult to clean the cap after dosing, and also expensive from a unit cost perspective. The Enyur laundry sheets are definitely a great travel companion! I liked that the sheets come in a compact, decent plastic box that I can pack in my suitcase and take it with me easily – this also provides me with peace of mind that the detergent sheets won’t get damaged during traveling. It’s very easy to apply the appropriate dose by following the table shown in the box. Further, the detergent sheets are very versatile since they work in any type of laundry machine – whether standard or high-efficiency – and work great to remove stubborn marks that always happen while traveling, such as ketchup, carbonated beverage, sauce, etc. Overall, I’m very pleased with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for vacation. Tried it at home before leaving. No suds no fragrance. BUT CLEANS WRLL. Used 2 sheets on small load.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: We are so glad that we packed this detergent for our trip. The detergent completely dissolved in water, so we were able to wash clothing throughout the trip. Would definitely purchase again!
